attributes.action: section under the mental health act those people choosing to have a BMI in excess of 30
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If it is legally possible to section anorexics should it not also be possible to section obese people who are selfishly endangering their own lives and putting undue strain on the NHS.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
